title: Broken Dolls
description: A broken woman.A sociopathic killer.An unlikely love story.The house promises a kind master, but the monster in the dungeon wants her. And Brian breaks all his toys.Mina Calloway is lured to the Pleasure House with the promise that all her dark fantasies will come true, but her past abuse makes her too hard to train.Instead of being sold as promised, she ends up in the dungeons, left in the hands of the house’s most brutal and sociopathic trainer. When she looks into his cold dark eyes, she’s sure her life is over. Brian is a monster, a known killer. But he’s paid a lot of money to possess her, and the security bracelet locked around her wrist ensures she won’t be going anywhere anytime soon.All the books in the Pleasure House series are interlocking standalones and can be read in any order.This title was originally published December, 2014.
author: Kitty Thomas
